item.description:
Saturday is looking like the pick of the weekend. I have a few routes in this area I want to do involving the ridge from Guyot to Lafayette. I'll throw this one out there to see if there is any interest. If anyone is interested in another part of this ridge I can be swayed to one of those. However I am looking for a good workout with 15+ miles and 5000+ elevation gain at better than booktime.

GPS coordinates: 44.237887, -71.547356
Map of 44.237887, -71.547356

Distance: 16 miles
Elevation gain: 5119 ft
Book Time: 10 hours and 35 minutes
Trails: Gale River, Twinway, North Twin

This is a long hike with a good amount of elevation. I am expecting to beat booktime. To sign up for this hike you should have some recent experience with hikes of this length and amount of elevation gain. Water is available at Galehead hut. A carspot is required.



Please keep your rsvp's up to date. Its very important that we have a true headcount, and not worry that your late or lost.

Make sure your hiker profile is complete so we can verify that your qualified to join us on this White Mountain hike.

See What to wear on a hike and pack water and food.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.

Carpooling is always advised and a great way to get to know your fellow members.
item.name: Galehead, Guyot, & Twins
